name: Undercooked
description:
Undercooked is a text-based online co-op cooking game that runs as a bot in a Discord server!

If you just want to hop in and play as ASAP as possible, join the official Undercooked Discord Game Server here: https://discord.gg/zXfrTJR

If you want to add the Undercooked bot to your own personal/private server, just invite the Bot to your server and give them read/send message permissions in whatever channel you want to play in!

If you want to play Undercooked when the official bot is down, you can download the node.js source and follow the instructions in the README!

The server has 5 channels available for playing in. A few levels allow you to play solo, but it's intended to be a co-op game, so invite some friends to join you, or find someone to play with in the "find-games" channel.

If you want a private or custom instance of Undercooked, you can download the source code here and follow the instructions in the README to set up your own bot!
